epilogue.title: Sorry, Kyu Doesn't Actually Have A Proper Epilogue Yet

text.content: Yeah, that wasn't a joke title, she just seriously doesn't have an epilogue yet. So, you're stuck with me for now.

It's ya girl yurispacepirate, here today to take up your valuable time and the game's valuable storage space with a gimmicky attempt at boosting my own ego through flattering self-portraits in kisekae, when a post on the forums would have worked just as well.
Flagrant displays of extreme narcissism aside, I hope you enjoyed playing against Kyu. Or, if you didn't, you have some critique on ways I can make her better.
But another thing I want feedback on is what her epilogue should be, because I'm not just an egomaniac, but also indecisive and lazy.

So, if you wouldn't mind filling out a little poll here on which lovely HuniePop lady should get in on the action for Kyu's actual ending with her full release approximately seven billion years from now, here's the link:
Think of it as my gift to you for taking the time to play against her.
You also might be wondering why some of your favourite girls are missing from the list of options. Let's just say that I have other plans for them. Exciting plans.
Thanks again for taking the time to listen to this garbage. Laters, skaters.
